GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by created_at date in descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article specified by article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given article_id, sorted by created_at date in ascending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment on an article and serves an object of that comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count on an article and serves an object of that updated article
